mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM comment where comment_time BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime} and game_id = (select id from games where game_name = #{gameName} and from_store = #{store}) GROUP BY type

GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(comment_time,'%m-%d'),type
